attributes.action: sort the state of the roads out or pay back our road tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition speaks for itself. The state of the roads at present and its potholes are a disgrace. This needs to be fixed with the money we spend on our road tax, as this costs us enough anyway and we do not see the benefits. So this should either be resolved or refunded.
